Name: Cubicle Farm
Description: An endless sea of cubicles where boring people live out their boring lives

Name: Leisure Area
Description: A terrible place that reeks of stale coffee.

Name: IT
Description: It's like a zombie movie except instead of groans and grunts you hear mindless drones endlessly repeating the phrase 'reinvent the wheel'

Name: HR
Description: A den of cackling harpies that wield their power with impunity
